resources.string: Press the Back button again to exit.
Turn off mute mode of the volume.
Mic Permission denied. You need to allow the Mic Permission directly to measure noise around.
You need to allow the Mic Permission to measure noise around.
Set detail of Auto Volume function. (Mic Volume, Mic Sensitivity, Volume Adjustment Interval)
The volume of your smartphone will be adjusted depending on this value. \nThis value is calculated reflected the value of Mic volume and Mic Sensitivity.
The higher the value, the larger the microphone input value is measured.
The higher the value, the greater the range in which the microphone input value changes.
The interval to adjust volume. The average value of the Mic Input Value is obtained during the set time and the volume is adjusted accordingly.
